meanings.sent1: The interdictory sign clearly stated 'No Entry'.
meanings.sent2: The interdictory rules prevented any unauthorized access.
meanings.sent3: The interdictory message on the door made the cat hesitate before entering.
meanings.sent4: His interdictory gaze silenced any further discussion.
meanings.sent5: The interdictory tone in her voice left no room for negotiation.

meanings.definition: Serving as a warning or deterrent
meanings.sent1: The interdictory alarm blared loudly, signaling danger.
meanings.sent2: The interdictory lights flashed to caution drivers of the icy road ahead.
meanings.sent3: The interdictory beeping of the machine startled the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: His interdictory gesture stopped her from taking another step forward.
meanings.sent5: The interdictory look in his eyes warned her of the impending storm.

meanings.sent1: Her interdictory expression clearly showed her disagreement.
meanings.sent2: The interdictory remarks from the audience made the speaker nervous.
meanings.sent3: The interdictory frown on his face made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: His interdictory stance against the proposal surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The interdictory silence in the room spoke volumes about their dissatisfaction.
